TITLE: Course Information Services
DEF: Central repository for instructor provided summaries of course contents
TASK: The Course Information Services pattern lends support to a centralized repository for instructor-provided summaries of course contents. Its main role is to provide a comprehensive and accessible source of information about the course. This entails compiling, organizing, and updating content summaries as provided by instructors. To maximize this pattern's efficacy, the challenge lies in maintaining the relevance and accuracy of the information, ensuring easy accessibility for all students, and updating the repository in line with changes in course content.
